Uses of Class
gametools.Sprite.Direction

    • Uses of Sprite.Direction in gametools

      Methods in gametools that return Sprite.Direction 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Sprite.Direction Sprite.getLastDirection()
      Returns the direction the sprite was moved in the previous or current frame.
      static Sprite.Direction Sprite.Direction.valueOf(java.lang.String name)
      Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
      static Sprite.Direction[] Sprite.Direction.values()
      Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.
      Methods in gametools with parameters of type Sprite.Direction 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Sprite.move(Sprite.Direction dir)
      Moves the sprite at one of the defined directions at the set speed.
      void Sprite.move(Sprite.Direction dir, int speed)
      Moves the sprite at one of the defined directions at a custom speed.
      void Sprite.moveConstantly(Sprite.Direction dir)
      Moves the sprite constantly in the specified direction until it gets removed or it goes outside its movement area.
